mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(pk_user_id, user_name, user_password, user_phone) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userPhone});
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_password = #{userPassword} WHERE pk_user_id = #{userId};
UPDATE user SET user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_gender = #{userGender}, user_introduction = #{userIntroduction} WHERE pk_user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT pk_user_id FROM user WHERE pk_user_id = #{userId} AND user_password = #{userPassword});
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT pk_user_id FROM user WHERE pk_user_id = #{userId});
SELECT user_name, user_phone, user_group, user_gender, user_email, user_avatar, user_introduction FROM user WHERE pk_user_id = #{userId};
